DOC.brief_summary: LIM-0705 dose separately combination tacrolimus safe well tolerate .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability LIM-0705 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male age 1850 Patient good health deem prestudy exam history BMI 2030 kg/sq . meter Absence tremor Must willing remain confinement 17 days/16 night Systolic BP 90140 mmHg , diastolic BP 5090 mmHg , rest HR 4590 bpm Subject must nonsmoker willing abstain smoking day 4 day 30 . Subject must abstain alcohol , grapefruit , caffeinecontaining beverage start Day 2 Day 30 . Subjects must use doublebarrier contraception course study + 90 day follow study Allergy red wine onion Strict vegetarian Use nonstudy medication Use chemotherapy within 5 year prior Screening visit Use dietary aid Difficultly swallow oral medication cognitive psychiatric disorder
